| where CategoryName_s == test

## Vulnerabilities"},"name":"text - 4"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"// make a table from https://www.cisa.gov/known-exploited-vulnerabilities-catalog
let CISA_NEV = (externaldata(CveId:string,vendorProject:string,product:string,vulnerabilityName:string,dateAdded:string,shortDescription:string,requiredAction:string,dueDate:datetime)
[@"https://www.cisa.gov/sites/default/files/csv/known_exploited_vulnerabilities.csv"] 
with (format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true));
let CISA_NEV_CveIDs= CISA_NEV | project CveId;  // make a list from CVEs column
let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmAssetWebComponent_CL
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| where WebComponentCves_s <> "[]"
| extend vulns = parse_json(WebComponentCves_s)
| mv-expand vulns
| extend cve = tostring(vulns.Cve)
| extend cvss3 = toint(vulns.Cvss3Score)
| project SnapshotDateTime_t, AssetName_s, WebComponentName_s, WebComponentVersion_s, cve, cvss3, WebComponentLastSeen_t, WorkspaceName_s
// join with assets' last seen date (show only "recent" web components).
| join kind=leftsemi (EasmAsset_CL
    | project AssetName_s, AssetLastSeen_t)
    on $left.WebComponentLastSeen_t == $right.AssetLastSeen_t
| extend exploit_available = iff(cve in (CISA_NEV_CveIDs), "yes", "no")
| join kind=fullouter CISA_NEV on $left.cve == $right.CveId  // Join table of CVEs on devices to CISA NEV table
| where AssetName_s <> ""
| summarize by AssetName_s, WebComponentName_s, WebComponentVersion_s, cve, cvss3, exploit_available, vendorProject, product, vulnerabilityName, dateAdded, shortDescription, requiredAction
| summarize count() by exploit_available

","size":0,"title":"Exploit available","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","exportFieldName":"","exportParameterName":"exploit","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"piechart","sortBy":[],"tileSettings":{"showBorder":false,"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"AssetName_s","formatter":1},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"count_","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"maximumSignificantDigits":3,"maximumFractionDigits":2}}}},"graphSettings":{"type":0,"topContent":{"columnMatch":"AssetName_s","formatter":1},"centerContent":{"columnMatch":"count_","formatter":1,"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"maximumSignificantDigits":3,"maximumFractionDigits":2}}}},"chartSettings":{"showMetrics":false,"showLegend":true,"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"no","label":"No","color":"blue"},{"seriesName":"yes","label":"Yes","color":"redBright"}],"ySettings":{"min":0}}},"customWidth":"30","name":"Risk Findings overall"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let exploit_ = dynamic({exploit});
// make a table from https://www.cisa.gov/known-exploited-vulnerabilities-catalog
let CISA_NEV = (externaldata(CveId:string,vendorProject:string,product:string,vulnerabilityName:string,dateAdded:string,shortDescription:string,requiredAction:string,dueDate:datetime)
[@"https://www.cisa.gov/sites/default/files/csv/known_exploited_vulnerabilities.csv"] 
with (format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true));
let CISA_NEV_CveIDs= CISA_NEV | project CveId;  // make a list from CVEs column
let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmAssetWebComponent_CL
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)| extend test = parse_json(tostring(exploit_)).series
| where WebComponentCves_s <> "[]"
| extend vulns = parse_json(WebComponentCves_s)
| mv-expand vulns
| extend cve = tostring(vulns.Cve)
| extend cvss3 = round(todouble(vulns.Cvss3Score),2)
| project SnapshotDateTime_t, AssetName_s, WebComponentName_s, WebComponentVersion_s, cve, cvss3, WebComponentLastSeen_t, WorkspaceName_s, test
// join with assets' last seen date (show only "recent" web components).
| join kind=leftsemi (EasmAsset_CL
    | project AssetName_s, AssetLastSeen_t)
    on $left.WebComponentLastSeen_t == $right.AssetLastSeen_t
| extend exploit_available = iff(cve in (CISA_NEV_CveIDs), "yes", "no")
| where exploit_available == test
| join kind=fullouter CISA_NEV on $left.cve == $right.CveId  // Join table of CVEs on devices to CISA NEV table
| where AssetName_s <> ""
| summarize by Asset=AssetName_s, Component=WebComponentName_s, Version=WebComponentVersion_s, CVE=cve, CVSS3=cvss3, Exploit=exploit_available, Vendor=vendorProject, Product=product, Vulnerability=vulnerabilityName, Description=shortDescription
| order by CVSS3 desc","size":0,"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","exportFieldName":"Asset","exportParameterName":"assetname","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"table","sortBy":[]},"customWidth":"70","name":"All - data1"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let asset_ = '{assetname}';
let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmRisk_CL
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| where AssetName_s == asset_
| project CategoryName_s, MetricDisplayName_s, SnapshotDateTime_t
| order by SnapshotDateTime_t desc","size":0,"title":"Asset's Risk Observations over time","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"]},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 3"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let asset_ = '{assetname}';
let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmAssetWebComponent_CL
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| where AssetName_s == asset_
//| extend test = parse_json(tostring(exploit_)).series
| where WebComponentCves_s <> "[]"
| extend vulns = parse_json(WebComponentCves_s)
| mv-expand vulns
| extend cve = tostring(vulns.Cve)
| extend cvss3 = round(todouble(vulns.Cvss3Score),2)
| project SnapshotDateTime_t, AssetName_s, WebComponentName_s, WebComponentVersion_s, cve, cvss3, WebComponentLastSeen_t, WorkspaceName_s
// join with assets' last seen date (show only "recent" web components).
| join kind=leftsemi (EasmAsset_CL
    | project AssetName_s, AssetLastSeen_t)
    on $left.WebComponentLastSeen_t == $right.AssetLastSeen_t
| summarize by Component=WebComponentName_s, Version=WebComponentVersion_s, CVE=cve, CVSS3=cvss3
| order by CVSS3 desc","size":0,"title":"Asset's All Vulnerabilities","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"]},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 4"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"TAB","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Vulnerabilities"},"name":"Vulns","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"---

| sort by SnapshotDateTime_t desc

## Assets by Risk - based on latest snapshot

(Risk Score - high severity = 10pt, medium = 5pt, low = 1pt)"},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmRisk_CL
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| where TimeGenerated > ago(10d) 
| summarize by SnapshotDateTime_t
| sort by SnapshotDateTime_t desc 
| take 1
| join (EasmRisk_CL)
    on $left.SnapshotDateTime_t == $right.SnapshotDateTime_t
| extend Low = iff(CategoryName_s == "Low Severity",1,0)
| extend Medium = iff(CategoryName_s == "Medium Severity",1,0)
| extend High = iff(CategoryName_s == "High Severity",1,0)
| summarize LowSum=sum(Low), MedSum=sum(Medium), HighSum=sum(High) by AssetName_s, AssetType_s, AssetFirstSeen_t, AssetLastSeen_t
| extend RiskScore = HighSum*10 + MedSum*5 + LowSum
| project RiskScore, AssetName_s, AssetType_s, HighSum, MedSum, LowSum
| sort by RiskScore desc","size":0,"exportParameterName":"assetname","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"RiskScore","sortOrder":2}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"RiskScore","sortOrder":2}]},"customWidth":"50","name":"Assets top"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let assetname_ = dynamic({assetname});
let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmRisk_CL
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| extend test = parse_json(tostring(assetname_)).AssetName_s
| where AssetName_s == test
| summarize Count=count() by MetricDisplayName_s, SnapshotDateTime_t

---"},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"parameters":[{"id":"e4959c6c-8acb-431f-ac97-27963fe106b2","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Snapshot","type":2,"isRequired":true,"query":"let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmRisk_CL 
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| summarize by snap=SnapshotDateTime_t
| order by snap desc","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":[],"showDefault":false},"timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","value":null,"label":"Choose a Snapshot"}],"style":"above","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"parameters - 2"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"---
New observations in selected snapshot (high, medium, low)
---
(observations not seen before)
"},"name":"text - 6"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"//let lookback1 = 10d;
let lookback2 = 30d;
let sev = "High Severity";
let sev2 = "Medium Severity";
let sev3 = "Low Severity";
let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
// find all observations which have been seen only once within timeline (30d)
EasmRisk_CL 
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| where TimeGenerated > ago(lookback2)
| where SnapshotDateTime_t <= datetime('{Snapshot}')
| where CategoryName_s == sev or CategoryName_s == sev2 or CategoryName_s == sev3
| summarize count() by AssetId_s, MetricDisplayName_s//, SnapshotDateTime_t
| where count_ == 1
// join the rest of the infromation to found assets/observations
| join (EasmRisk_CL)
on AssetId_s, MetricDisplayName_s
| where SnapshotDateTime_t == datetime('{Snapshot}')
| project SnapshotDateTime_t, CategoryName_s, MetricDisplayName_s, AssetName_s, AssetDescription_s, AssetType_s, AssetFirstSeen_t, AssetLastSeen_t
| order by CategoryName_s asc

","size":1,"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"MetricDisplayName_s","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"MetricDisplayName_s","sortOrder":1}]},"name":"query - 10"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"---
All observations in selected snapshot (high, medium, low)
---"},"name":"text - 6 - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmRisk_CL 
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| where SnapshotDateTime_t == datetime('{Snapshot}')
| where CategoryName_s == "High Severity"
//| extend Priority = 'High'
//| project Priority, MetricDisplayName_s, AssetName_s
| summarize Count=count() by MetricDisplayName_s
| order by Count desc

","size":0,"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"]},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 4"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"---
Vulnerabilities & Exploits
---"},"name":"text - 6 - Copy - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let asset_ = '{AssetName}';
// make a table from https://www.cisa.gov/known-exploited-vulnerabilities-catalog
let CISA_NEV = (externaldata(CveId:string,vendorProject:string,product:string,vulnerabilityName:string,dateAdded:string,shortDescription:string,requiredAction:string,dueDate:datetime)
[@"https://www.cisa.gov/sites/default/files/csv/known_exploited_vulnerabilities.csv"] 
with (format="csv",ignoreFirstRecord=true));
let CISA_NEV_CveIDs= CISA_NEV | project CveId;  // make a list from CVEs column
let workspace = '{workspace_name}';
EasmAssetWebComponent_CL
| where AssetName_s == asset_
| where WorkspaceName_s in (workspace)
| where WebComponentCves_s <> "[]"
| extend vulns = parse_json(WebComponentCves_s)
| mv-expand vulns
| extend cve = tostring(vulns.Cve)
| extend cvss3 = round(todouble(vulns.Cvss3Score),2)
| project SnapshotDateTime_t, AssetName_s, WebComponentName_s, WebComponentVersion_s, cve, cvss3, WebComponentLastSeen_t, WorkspaceName_s
// join with assets' last seen date (show only "recent" web components).
| join kind=leftsemi (EasmAsset_CL
    | project AssetName_s, AssetLastSeen_t)
    on $left.WebComponentLastSeen_t == $right.AssetLastSeen_t
| extend exploit_available = iff(cve in (CISA_NEV_CveIDs), "yes", "no")
| join kind=fullouter CISA_NEV on $left.cve == $right.CveId  // Join table of CVEs on devices to CISA NEV table
| where AssetName_s <> ""
| summarize by Asset=AssetName_s, Component=WebComponentName_s, Version=WebComponentVersion_s, CVE=cve, CVSS3=cvss3, Exploit=exploit_available, Vendor=vendorProject, Product=product, Vulnerability=vulnerabilityName, Description=shortDescription
| order by CVSS3 desc","size":0,"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"]},"name":"query - 5"}]},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"TAB","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"AssetBrowser"},"name":"New - Copy","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}}],"isLocked":false,"fallbackResourceIds":[""],"fromTemplateId":"sentinel-UserWorkbook"}
